content: All the sessions older than 60 days will be automatically deleted.

comment.text: The translation key "AutoDeleteTitle" is used to display a message that explains the automatic deletion policy of inactive sessions. In this case, it would be used to show the reason behind deleting old sessions automatically. It appears in the UI as a placeholder text and needs to be replaced with a localized version after fixing the backend issue.

usage.context:
<Text fontSize="16px" fontWeight={700} lineHeight="22px">
 {t("Profile:ActiveSessions")}
 </Text>
 
 {/* TODO: Uncomment after fix on backend */}
 {/* <Text className="auto-delete-title">{t("Profile:AutoDeleteTitle")}</Text> */}
 
 <div className="terminate-session-container">
 <Link
 className="terminate-all-sessions"
 type="action"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '60 gündən köhnə bütün sessiyalar avtomatik silinəcək' while understandable, isn't the most natural or idiomatic way to express the English sentence. A better phrasing would emphasize the automatic deletion applies to all sessions older than 60 days.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 60 gündən artıq olan bütün sessiyalar avtomatik silinəcək.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Bulgarian translation 'Всички по-стари от 60 дни сесии ще бъдат автоматично изтрити' is grammatically correct, but slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would place 'автоматично' earlier.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Всички сесии, по-стари от 60 дни, ще бъдат автоматично изтрити.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "sessions" is translated as "περίοδοι λειτουργίας" which is too literal and doesn't convey the intended meaning of user sessions in a software context. A better translation would be closer to "λογαριασμοί" or "συνεδρίες".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "λογαριασμοί" (accounts) or "συνεδρίες" (sessions) for a more accurate translation of 'sessions'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation "60 օրից բոլոր հին սեանսները ինքնաբերաբար կջնջվեն։" is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Armenian. The word order is a bit awkward. "Հին" (old) might not be the best descriptor here, as 'sessions' are just old, not necessarily 'old' in terms of age.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like: "Բոլոր սեանսները, որոնք ավելի քան 60 օրվա են, ինքնաբերաբար ջնջվելու են։" or "60 օր ավելի քան հասակ առած բոլոր սեանսները ինքնաբերաբար ջնջվելու են։"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ການນັ່ງ' (kan nang) which translates to 'sitting' is used instead of 'data' or 'records'. This is an incorrect term in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການບັນທຶກຂໍ້ມູນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The overall meaning is slightly off. 'ການນັ່ງ' doesn't accurately convey the concept of 'sessions' in this context. It implies physical sitting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການເຮັດວຽກ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Toate sesiunile vor fi șterse automat în termen de 60 de zile' is a bit wordy and could be more concise. 'In termen de' translates to 'within' or 'in terms of', which isn't the most natural phrasing in this context. It implies a timeframe for the deletion, but the original implies the sessions are deleted *after* 60 days.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Toate sesiunile mai vechi de 60 de zile vor fi șterse automat.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'sessions' (සැසි) is translated correctly, but the overall sentence structure feels slightly unnatural in Sinhala. A more fluent translation might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සියලුම සැසි 60 දිනකට පෙර ඇති නම් ඒවා ස්වයංක්‍රීයව මකා දමනු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the word 'නම්' following the date is a bit clunky. It feels like an unnecessary repetition of the concept of 'if'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සියලුම සැසි 60 දිනකට පෙර ඇති විට ඒවා ස්වයංක්‍රීයව මකා දමනු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Tất cả các phiên giao dịch trên 60 ngày sẽ tự động bị xóa" is a literal translation and might not be the most natural way to express the meaning in Vietnamese. 'Sessions' is not directly equivalent to 'phiên giao dịch' and can be more broadly interpreted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tất cả các phiên làm việc cũ hơn 60 ngày sẽ tự động bị xóa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'phiên giao dịch' (transaction sessions) sounds too transactional.  'Sessions' in this context likely refers to user sessions or activity logs, not financial transactions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tất cả các phiên sử dụng/hoạt động cũ hơn 60 ngày sẽ tự động bị xóa.
